claims.object: shows a trace through the operation of a system

surface_layer.definition: A graphical representation of signal timings in a digital system.

deep_layer.mechanism: Displays signal transitions over time, allowing for analysis of setup and hold times.
deep_layer.origin: Developed as a tool for understanding and debugging digital circuits.

examples: Timing diagram of a memory read operation
Timing diagram of a serial communication protocol

citations: Timing diagrams. Memory. Busses and interconnect.
